title: Mitchelton Hotel Luxe Goulburn Valley Winery Escape with Cellar Door Tasting & Daily Breakfast
description:
There's nothing like a romantic escape to the vine-laced hills of the renowned Goulburn Valley - and if you can have a glass or two of vino from the onsite cellar door and simply walk back to your designer room, then even better. Welcome to your country sanctuary: The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel. Just 90 minutes from Melbourne, this hotel is an architectural marvel designed by the renowned Hecker Guthrie and features both earthy tones and every modern luxury, with each personal haven offering views over the estate's vineyards or the idyllic Goulburn Valley.

Unwind in true MGallery by Sofitel sophistication with a winery rated five stars by the 2021 Halliday Wine Companion literally at your doorstep, a 20-metre infinity pool and a world-class restaurant serving modern farmhouse cuisine with views over the glistening Goulburn River. Soak up the simple pleasures at this renowned hotel, enveloped by 280 acres of vines and native bushland, with award-winning luxuries on tap and a bounty of serenity, all just a short drive from Melbourne CBD.

title: Luxe Goulburn Valley Ultimate Winery Escape with Cellar Door Tasting & Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to the romantic allure of the Goulburn Valley's prestigious vine-draped hills. Just a scenic 90-minute drive from Melbourne, discover a stunning architectural gem envisioned by the esteemed Hecker Guthrie. Here, your rural retreat awaits, seamlessly blending rustic allure with contemporary sophistication, offering the full winery experience right on your doorstep.

Each private sanctuary boasts a harmonious fusion of natural hues and lavish modern comforts, as well as offering sweeping vistas of the estate's vineyards or the picturesque Goulburn Valley. Relax in pure sophistication at the Mitchelton Wines cellar door, conveniently located just steps from your accommodation. Take a dip in the 20-metre infinity pool and dine at the esteemed Muse restaurant, offering modern farmhouse cuisine, all within breathtaking view of the shimmering Goulburn River.

Immerse yourself in this renowned hotel's tranquil ambience - surrounded by 280 acres of vineyards and native bushland - indulge in highly sought after luxuries and revel in the abundance of serenity.

title: Luxe Goulburn Valley Sofitel Vineyard Escape with Cellar Door Tasting & Daily Breakfast
description:
There's nothing like a romantic escape to the vine-laced hills of the renowned Goulburn Valley, and if you can have a glass or two of vino from the onsite cellar door and simply walk back to your designer room, then even better. Welcome to your country sanctuary: The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel. Just 90 minutes from Melbourne, this hotel is an architectural marvel designed by the renowned Hecker Guthrie, featuring both earthy tones and every modern luxury, where each personal haven offers views over the estate's vineyards or the idyllic Goulburn Valley.

Unwind in true MGallery by Sofitel sophistication with a winery rated five stars by the 2021 Halliday Wine Companion literally at your doorstep, a 20-metre infinity pool and a world-class restaurant serving modern farmhouse cuisine and views over the glistening Goulburn River. Soak up the simple pleasures at this renowned hotel, enveloped by 280 acres of vines and native bushland, with award-winning luxuries on tap and a bounty of serenity just a short drive from Melbourne CBD.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Indulgence means starting every morning with daily à la carte breakfast at The Muse restaurant
- Taste the region's finest with a glass of award-winning wine each on arrival
- See why the onsite cellar door was rated five stars with a complimentary tasting for two
- Unwind with two A$25 spa credits per package for separate treatments of 60+ minutes
- Drink in the serenity for longer with a 12pm late checkout
- Receive a complimentary bottle of Estate Wine upon purchase of six bottles of Estate Wine at the cellar door

**Upgrade bonus:** Choose the River-View Room or Deluxe River-View Room and receive an indulgent chef's selection entrée plate to share at The Muse restaurant.

title: Boutique Goulburn Valley Vineyard Stay with Cellar Door Tasting
description:
Experience the height of contemporary luxury nestled in the vine-laced hills of Goulbourn Valley at one of Australia’s favourite wineries and boutique designer hotels, The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel. Designed by renowned architecture and interior design firm Hecker Guthrie, this picturesque hotel, exemplary of Sofitel sophistication and service, can be reached in just 90 minutes by car from Melbourne. Unwind with daily breakfast, a welcome glass of local wine each, a cellar door tasting, two A$25 spa credits per room, per stay, and a leisurely 12pm checkout.

Plus, wine connoisseurs will love the complimentary bottle of wine upon purchase of six award-winning, Mitchelton bottles.
location_description: The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel 2020

title: Mitchelton - Grand Opening Designer Hotel & Winery
description: Experience the height of regional luxury at one of Australia’s favourite wineries and boutique designer hotel's Mitchelton. Spend two nights at the brand-new Mitchelton Hotel in Nagambie - only 90-minutes’ drive from Melbourne and enjoy daily made-to-order a la carte breakfast, a welcome glass of Mitchelton wine each on arrival, two AU$25 spa credits, a complimentary cellar door tasting, discounted wine purchases and a guaranteed late midday checkout for two.

title: Boutique Vineyard Stay with Goulburn River Views & Day Spa

Designed by renowned architecture and interior design firm Hecker Guthrie, the hotel can be reached in just 90 minutes by car from Melbourne. Included in your escape is a daily a la carte breakfast, a welcome glass of wine each, a cellar door tasting with 10% off purchases, two AU$25 spa vouchers and a leisurely noon check-out.

title: Goulburn Valley MGallery by Sofitel Vineyard Stay
description:
Experience the height of contemporary luxury nestled in the vine-laced hills of Goulburn Valley at one of Australia’s favourite wineries and boutique designer hotels, The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel. This picturesque hotel just 90 minutes by car from Melbourne showcases MGallery by Sofitel sophistication and service, while its idyllic location places renowned wineries, gourmet produce and sweeping country views are at your fingertips. When you're ready to relax, make the most of the hotel's luxe facilities including the striking 20m solar-heated infinity pool, tranquil day spa, gourmet restaurant, underground cellar door, decadent Ministry of Chocolate café and underground art gallery.

**Your handpicked inclusions:** 

- Deluxe daily breakfast
- A complimentary glass of wine per adult

**Luxury Upgrade:** Want even more luxury? Upgrade to a Deluxe River View room with an Illy coffee machine and luxurious free-standing deep-soak tub in a spacious bathroom.
location_description: The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel LM - OLD

title: Tranquil Riverside Victoria Winery Escape with Onsite Day Spa, Infinity Pool & Restaurants
description: Listen to the river flow, smell the native flora and taste some of the region’s best wine at the The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel, tucked away within Victoria’s abundant Goulburn Valley. This boutique, architecturally designed hotel is equal parts modern and contemporary, with elegant touches throughout. When you’re not tasting your way through the award-winning wine list, enjoy a relaxing dip in the picturesque infinity pool or indulge in a gourmet meal at The Muse.
location_description: The Mitchelton Hotel Nagambie - MGallery by Sofitel
